TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs extends System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 工作流实例可以以下三种方式终止：宿主调用 ，从工作流实例之内调用 活动，或者由于出现未经处理的异常，工作流运行时引擎终止实例。A workflow instance may be terminated in one of three ways: the host may call , a activity may be invoked from inside the workflow instance, or the workflow runtime engine may terminate the instance because of an unhandled exception. 当工作流实例终止时，工作流运行时引擎将引发 事件。When the workflow instance is terminated, the workflow runtime engine raises the event. 宿主可通过将事件处理程序添加到 来订阅此事件。The host may subscribe to this event by adding an event handler to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个将 用作参数的事件处理程序方法。The following code example demonstrates an event handler method that takes as a parameter. 在引发 `OnWorkflowTerminated` 事件时调用 方法。The `OnWorkflowTerminated` method is called when the event is raised. 该代码使用 属性获取与导致工作流终止的异常关联的消息。The code uses the property get the message associated with the exception that caused the workflow to terminate. 此代码示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的“带有参数的顺序工作流”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Sequential Workflow with Parameters SDK Sample from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用参数示例工作流](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741685(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Workflow with Parameters Sample](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741685(v=vs.90)). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#193](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets19.cs#193)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#193](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets19.vb#193)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception

summary.span: 获取导致工作流实例终止的异常。

span.span: Gets the exception that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.

value.span: 导致工作流实例终止的 。

span.span: The that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当工作流实例由于未经处理的异常而终止时， 将包含未经处理的异常。When the workflow instance is terminated because of an unhandled exception, contains the unhandled exception. 当工作流实例由于宿主对 的调用或由于 活动而终止时， 包含一个 ，其 属性设置为终止原因的说明。When the workflow instance is terminated by either a host call to or by a activity, contains a that has its property set to a description of the reason for the termination. 如果宿主终止了工作流实例，宿主将在 `string` 参数中向 提供此说明。If the host terminates the workflow instance, it supplies this description in the `string` parameter to . 如果工作流实例是由 终止，则由 提供说明。If the workflow instance is terminated by a , the description is supplied by . > [!NOTE] > 尽管在发生不导致未经处理的异常的 事件时，工作流运行时引擎会在 的 属性中包装终止的原因说明，但是工作流运行时引擎并不一定会引发此异常。Although in the case of a event that is not due to an unhandled exception, the workflow runtime engine encapsulates a description of the reason for the termination in the property of a , it does not necessarily throw this exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来获取有关导致工作流终止的异常的信息。The following code example demonstrates how you can use the property to obtain information about an exception that caused a workflow to terminate. `OnWorkflowTerminated` 方法将 用作参数。The `OnWorkflowTerminated` method takes a as a parameter. 此方法在引发 事件时调用。This method is called when the event is raised. 该代码使用 属性获取与导致工作流终止的异常关联的消息。The code uses the property get the message associated with the exception that caused the workflow to terminate. 此代码示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的“带有参数的顺序工作流”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Sequential Workflow with Parameters SDK Sample from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用参数示例工作流](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741685(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Workflow with Parameters Sample](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741685(v=vs.90)).
